Name: 0xFF
About the game: Enter this science-fiction mystery in first-person. In front of you is an abandoned research zone. An experiment has become unstable, and you must find a way to stop it. Travel by land, air and sea to complete your mission. Radiation makes it dangerous to work outdoors. A skilled player can complete this game in a few hours. The game uses Raytracing to compute global illumination in real-time.
Meta Description: Looking for information on 0xFF? Check out the release date (Mar 28, 2023), developer insights from Sandstrom, and a complete game summary.
